Class Environment

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.World
      • Environment
  • public class Environment
extends greenfoot.World
    Environment is the world where the simulation takes place. It contains the road network and the cars.
    Author:
    EloiMusk

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      Graph roadNetwork
      The road network is a graph of WayPoints and Edges.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Environment()
      Creates a new environment.

    • Field Detail

      • roadNetwork

        public Graph roadNetwork
        The road network is a graph of WayPoints and Edges.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Environment

        public Environment()
        Creates a new environment. The environment is a 600x600 world with a 1x1 cell size. The background is set to a default image.

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        Act method of the environment.
        Overrides:
        act in class greenfoot.World

      • init

        public void init()
        Initializes the environment. Generates the road network and draws it. Only called once.
        See Also:
        generateGraph(), markWayPoints(), connectWayPoints()

      • spawnCar

        public void spawnCar()
        Spawns a car at a random incoming edge node.

      • getValidStartWayPoints

        public WayPoint[] getValidStartWayPoints()
        Gets all incoming edge nodes that are not occupied by a car.
        Returns:
        An array of all valid incoming edge nodes.

      • getObjectsInRange

        public <T extends greenfoot.Actor> java.util.List<T> getObjectsInRange​(java.lang.Class<T> cls,
                                                                       int range,
                                                                       int x,
                                                                       int y)
        Gets all objects of a certain class within a certain range of a position. With x and y coordinates.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Placeholder for the class of the objects to search for.
        Parameters:
        cls - The class of the objects to search for.
        range - The range to search in.
        x - The x position to search from.
        y - The y position to search from.
        Returns:
        A list of all objects of the specified class within the specified range of the specified position.

      • getObjectsInRange

        public <T extends greenfoot.Actor> java.util.List<T> getObjectsInRange​(java.lang.Class<T> cls,
                                                                       int range,
                                                                       Position pos)
        Gets all objects of a certain class within a certain range of a position. With a position object.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Placeholder for the class of the objects to search for.
        Parameters:
        cls - The class of the objects to search for.
        range - The range to search in.
        pos - The position to search from.
        Returns:
        A list of all objects of the specified class within the specified range of the specified position.

        Parameters:
